LanguageData.MFI_BumperCropRequest.label: harvesting request
LanguageData.MFI_Quest_PeaceTalks.label: a war be coming?
LanguageData.MFI_Quest_PeaceTalks.letterText:
You's gotten a message from some [PAWN_nameDef], {0} of {1}. Them thar's faction recently had some trouble with s'meother dudes and call upon ye to parlay with them and {2}. They got a nearby stash location and invite you to come'n'chat.

It could be a great treasure of a relationship boost with their faction, but beware - a poor chatter can do ye more harm than good.

The offer will expire after {3} days, after which [PAWN_nameDef] fears the worst.
LanguageData.MFI_AnnualExpo.label: the annual expo
